attributes.name: Beginning
attributes.description: "All things must start."

attributes.name: Bewitched Tunic
attributes.description: "Sometimes while wearing this tunic you feel as if your actions are not your own."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sometimes while wearing this tunic you feel as if your actions are not your own."

attributes.name: Bitterroot Trinket
attributes.description: "A reminder that as bitter as you get, there is always something more bitter in nature."
attributes.parsed_description: "A reminder that as bitter as you get, there is always something more bitter in nature."

attributes.name: Siphoning
attributes.parsed_description: You gain 1.0% mana per hit (cooldown 10s). Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.
You gain 2.2% mana per hit (cooldown 10s). Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.

attributes.name: Invigorated
attributes.parsed_description: Weaken, Disease, Exhaust, and Rend expires -3.0% faster.
Weaken, Disease, Exhaust, and Rend expires -3.9% faster.

attributes.name: Leeching
attributes.parsed_description: You gain 0.5% of your damage as health. Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.
You gain 1.4% of your damage as health. Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.

attributes.name: Refreshing Evasion
attributes.parsed_description: Reduces active cooldowns by -0.5% after exiting the dodge animation.
Reduces active cooldowns by -0.7% after exiting the dodge animation.

attributes.name: Luck
attributes.parsed_description: +0.5% chance at rare items from chests and monsters.
+2.8% chance at rare items from chests and monsters.
You gain 1.4% of your damage as health. Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.

attributes.name: Refreshing Ward
attributes.parsed_description: Reduces active cooldowns by -0.5% after being hit 5 times. Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.
Reduces active cooldowns by -1.9% after being hit 5 times. Does not trigger off persistent damage or DoT effects.

attributes.name: Taunting II
attributes.parsed_description: Taunts are active. You generate +200.0% more threat.
Taunts are active. You generate +204.4% more threat.

attributes.name: Reinforced Skinning Luck
attributes.parsed_description: While Skinning gain 2.0% chance at finding rare items.
While Skinning gain 4.7% chance at finding rare items.
+2.0% chance at rare items from chests and monsters.

attributes.parsed_description: An empty socket for a gem.

attributes.name: Freedom
attributes.parsed_description: Slow, Stun, and Silence expires -3.0% faster.

attributes.name: Purifying Toast
attributes.parsed_description: When you drink a regeneration potion lose 1.0 debuff.

attributes.parsed_description: When you drink a potion 5.0% chance it doesn't consume.
